channel.title: Need to know how to make the client run a different server!
channel.description:
Alright, so when I run the client, it doesn't run my server (partyscape.servegame.com). How can I make it so that it runs my server, and not the other one?
The source I am using is NewAgeRevolution.

item.title: Need to know how to make the client run a different server!
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

client.java

ctrl+h

newagerevolution.no-ip.biz

in the find

partyscape.servegame.com

OR

127.0.0.1

in replace. then replace all

Read full topic
item.source: Need to know how to make the client run a different server!

item.title: Need to know how to make the client run a different server!
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

Alright, I changed the port to what it’s supposed to be, but when I try to log in it says “Connecting to server: newagerevolution.no-ip.biz on port 43594”

And it doesn’t log me in.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to know how to make the client run a different server!

item.title: Need to know how to make the client run a different server!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Find

signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());

In client.java and the server and port should be right under that.

Read full topic
